unit.comment: // GB_mex_unpack_pack: unpack and then pack a matrix
// SuiteSparse:GraphBLAS, Timothy A. Davis, (c) 2017-2022, All Rights Reserved.
unit.cpp:define: #define FREE_WORK \ { \ if (Cp != NULL) { mxFree (Cp) ; Cp = NULL ; } \ if (Ch != NULL) { mxFree (Ch) ; Ch = NULL ; } \ if (Cb != NULL) { mxFree (Cb) ; Cb = NULL ; } \ if (Ci != NULL) { mxFree (Ci) ; Ci = NULL ; } \ if (Cx != NULL) { mxFree (Cx) ; Cx = NULL ; } \ GrB_Matrix_free_(&C) ; \ }
#define OK(method) \ { \ info = method ; \ if (info != GrB_SUCCESS) \ { \ FREE_WORK ; \ return (info) ; \ } \ }
unit.function_decl: GrB_Info unpack_pack ( int format_matrix, int format_export) ;
GrB_Info vector_unpack_pack ( int format_matrix, int format_export) ;

function.name: mexFunction
function.parameter_list: ( int nargout, mxArray *pargout [ ], int nargin, const mxArray *pargin [ ] )
